actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that no deductions on account of outside earnings will be made from the benefits of an individual who has attained age 65.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that no deductions on account of outside earnings under title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act shall be made from the benefits of an individual who has attained age 65 (presently age 72).

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that no deductions on account of outside earnings will be made from the benefits of an individual who has attained age 65.
